name: Sometimes You Just Need To Move Couple Of Boxes
name_original: Sometimes You Just Need To Move Couple Of Boxes
description:
Controls:

WSAD or Arrows to move

spacebar or enter for action

supprorts gamepad with left stick and A

My first entry to game jam.

Warning: game crashes when action button is spammed in the center.

done in about 12 hours of work

added HTML support after jam
